name: Day 3: Interactive Components
description:
Welcome to day 3 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! Today will be focused on Interactive Components. In the file you will find:

  1. A Thumbnail prototype demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating other applications of the feature


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype using Interactive Components. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
